textBeforeTable: Student Ticket Prices *Tickets subject to availability. Limit 10 discounted tickets per transaction. Students who present student identification, school t-shirts, caps, jerseys - anything that shows they are students - will receive discounted tickets in select seating areas. Get your tickets today and enjoy all the action at Great American Ball Park at a great savings! This season, the Reds are offering discounted tickets to students for ALL Wednesday home games, thanks to First Student! textAfterTable: HOW TO ORDER TICKETS: Click the  link above next to the game of your choice. Enter the password STUDNT in the box stating "Enter Offer Code/Password". Click OK. Search for tickets using the interactive seat map. Complete transaction. Skip to main content Below is an advertisement.
